title: Login Problems
body: Today I was playing league and my game bug splatted. Now whenever I try to log on Im just in a continuous loading screen. Ive tried repairing my client, using the Hextech repair tool, and turning off IP helper.

replies.body: same here i have not had this issue before

If your game is bugsplatting, it could be caused by some damaged or completely missing game files in general. Sometimes a repair can do the trick, and other times the issue lies a lot deeper. Let's cover the basics first with the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and let me know what seems to help and what doesn't.
